TopicTitle: Advanced options for parts by right clicking

Articles.Content: I can't find the old features I used to use all the time.  Right clicking parts used to permit autostrut, fuel flow priority, destaging fairings entirely, and more.  How do I turn these on?

In the main settings under General / Gameplay there is an option for "Advanced Tweakables."

You'll want to make sure that advanced tweakables is enabled.
This question about how to play the game has been moved to Gameplay Questions.

If you play career or science(???) mode then you also need to unlock the tech that allows you to use the feature. (IIRC General Construction for the autostruts, and Fuel Systems for the fuel flow priority.)
This threw me as well on the last career game I started. I thought they had just somehow decided to scrap all that.
